Param.Name: From
Param.Caption: C
Param.Default: Select Sysdate As ID from dual

Param.Name: To
Param.Caption: По
Param.Default: Select Sysdate As ID from dual

Param.Name: At
Param.Caption: На
Param.Default: Select Sysdate As ID from dual

Params.Param: With T As (Select 1 as Ord, '-1' As ID, 'Все клиенты' As TXT From Dual Union Select 2 as Ord, To_Char(CUST_SID) As ID, To_Char(LAST_NAME || ' ' || FIRST_NAME) As TXT From CMS.Customer Where CUST_SID in (Select Distinct CUST_SID From AKS.CUST_SC_PARAM)) Select ID, TXT From T Order By Ord

Workflows.Workflow: Select 'With A As (Select CUST_SID, MAX(ADDR_NO) As ADDR_NO From CMS.CUST_ADDRESS Where PHONE1 is not null and CUST_SID in (Select CUST_SID From aks.CUST_SC_PARAM) GROUP BY CUST_SID), AL As (Select A1.* From CMS.CUST_ADDRESS A1 inner join A A2 On A1.CUST_SID=A2.CUST_SID and A1.ADDR_NO=A2.ADDR_NO), T As (Select INVC_SID, Sum(Case When TENDER_TYPE=5 Then 0 else AMT End) As CASH, Sum(Case When TENDER_TYPE=5 Then AMT else 0 End) As BONUS From cms.invc_tender Group By INVC_SID) Select C.FIRST_NAME ||'' ''|| C.LAST_NAME As "Имя клиента", D.SC_PERC As "Бонусный %", T.CASH As "Исполь денег", Round((T.CASH*D.SC_PERC/100)-T.BONUS * Case When I.INVC_TYPE=0 Then 1 else -1 end,2) As "Начислено бон", round (T.BONUS,2) As "Исп баллов", Round(D.STORE_CREDIT,2) As "Остаток Баллов", D.INVC_NO As "Номер чека", D.POST_DATE As "Дата чека", --D.TOTAL_SUM As "Нарастающий", Case When I.INVC_TYPE=0 Then ''Продажа'' else ''Возврат'' end As "Тип чека" --D.INVC_SID As "Сид чека", --D.CUST_SID As "Сид покупателя", --D.SC_PERC As "Бонусный %", --C.FIRST_NAME, --C.LAST_NAME, --AL.PHONE1, --Sum(Case When I.INVC_TYPE=0 Then (T.CASH*D.SC_PERC/100) else 0 End) Over (Partition By D.CUST_SID Order By D.POST_DATE, D.INVC_NO) AS --"Нараст нач бонус", -- Sum(Case When I.INVC_TYPE<>0 Then (T.CASH*D.SC_PERC/100) else 0 End) Over (Partition By D.CUST_SID Order By D.POST_DATE, D.INVC_NO) --AS "Исп нач бонус" From AKS.INVC_SC_DOWN D inner join T T On D.INVC_SID=T.INVC_SID inner join CMS.invoice I On D.INVC_SID=I.INVC_SID inner join CMS.Customer C On D.CUST_SID=C.CUST_SID inner join AL On C.CUST_SID=AL.CUST_SID Where D.POST_DATE between To_Date(''@From'',''DD.MM.YYYY'') and To_Date(''@To'',''DD.MM.YYYY'') and C.CUST_SID = Case when ''@Customer''=''-1'' Then C.CUST_SID else to_number(''@Customer'') end Order BY D.POST_DATE, D.invc_no, D.Item_Pos' As QUERY, 'Report' As LIST_NAME, '@CurrentFolder\Export\Bonus_rpt.xlsx' As FILE_PATH, 'True' As "APPEND" From Dual

Select 'With A As (Select CUST_SID, MAX(ADDR_NO) As ADDR_NO From CMS.CUST_ADDRESS Where PHONE1 is not null and CUST_SID in (Select CUST_SID From aks.CUST_SC_PARAM) GROUP BY CUST_SID), AL As (Select A1.* From CMS.CUST_ADDRESS A1 inner join A A2 On A1.CUST_SID=A2.CUST_SID and A1.ADDR_NO=A2.ADDR_NO), T As (Select INVC_SID, Sum(Case When TENDER_TYPE=5 Then 0 else AMT End) As CASH, Sum(Case When TENDER_TYPE=5 Then AMT else 0 End) As BONUS From cms.invc_tender Group By INVC_SID), R As (Select C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, T.CASH, D.SC_PERC, T.BONUS, D.POST_DATE, D.INVC_NO, Round((T.CASH*D.SC_PERC/100) * Case When I.INVC_TYPE=0 Then 1 else -1 end,2) As NACH_BON, D.CUST_SID From AKS.INVC_SC_DOWN D inner join T T On D.INVC_SID=T.INVC_SID inner join CMS.invoice I On D.INVC_SID=I.INVC_SID inner join CMS.Customer C On D.CUST_SID=C.CUST_SID inner join AL On C.CUST_SID=AL.CUST_SID Where D.POST_DATE < To_Date(''@At'',''DD.MM.YYYY'') and C.CUST_SID = Case when ''@Customer''=''-1'' Then C.CUST_SID else to_number(''@Customer'') end), W As (Select R.FIRST_NAME ||'' ''|| R.LAST_NAME As "Имя клиента", Round(Sum (R.CASH) over (partition By R.CUST_SID),2) As "Исполь денег", R.SC_PERC As "Бонусный %", Round(Sum (R.NACH_BON) over (partition By R.CUST_SID),2) As "Начислено бон", Round(Sum (R.BONUS) over (partition By R.CUST_SID),2) As "Исп баллов", Row_number() over (partition By R.CUST_SID Order By R.POST_DATE desc , R.INVC_NO desc) As PRN From R R) Select "Имя клиента", "Исполь денег", "Бонусный %", "Начислено бон", "Исп баллов", Round("Начислено бон" - "Исп баллов",2) As "Остаток баллов" From W Where PRN=1 ' As QUERY, 'Report' As LIST_NAME, '@CurrentFolder\Export\Bonus_rpt.xlsx' As FILE_PATH, 'False' As "APPEND" From Dual
